body: Yeah American jokes can be funny but sometimes i just wanna spread awareness about obesity and about beyonder appearance in movie or show,judging by the MCU's way of treating comic books chara,i would say that beyonder's debut is very unlikely ir likely but not after a long years

@BeyonderzCoolAF you know I was just about to make an American joke to go with this but you beat me to it lol, P.S. the beyonder is cool AF in from the comic's I just wonder when he will be in a movie or show

But seriously girl,if your weight already exceed my weight (which is 68 kg),you should start a diet,cause the more fat you gain,the less activities you can do without getting exhausted,this will also lead to a very less movement lifestyle that's more bad than good,so if you somehow exceed 65 kg while not being above 170 cm in height, start a diet,change your lifestyle,2 km a day is enough as long as you're moving not just sitting around everyday
